```{r}
setwd("/Users/adilenegaribay/Dropbox/Quarto/adilenegaribay.github.io")
## histogram
data(mtcars)
par(bg="gray")
hist(mtcars$mpg,
     main = "Histogram of Miles Per Gallon",
     xlab = "Miles Per Gallon (mpg)",
     ylab = "Frequency",
     col = "darkgray",
     border = "deeppink3")
## barchart 
data(mtcars)
cyl_freq <- table(mtcars$cyl)
par(bg = "gray")
barplot(cyl_freq,
        main = "Vertical Bar Chart of Cylinder Counts",
        xlab = "Number of Cylinders",
        ylab = "Frequency",
        col = "darkgray",
        border = "deeppink3")
barplot(cyl_freq,
        main = "Horizontal Bar Chart of Cylinder Counts",
        xlab = "Frequency",
        ylab = "Number of Cylinders",
        col = "darkgray",
        border = "deeppink3",
        horiz = TRUE)
## piechart
data(mtcars)
cyl_freq <- table(mtcars$cyl)
par(bg = "gray")
pie(cyl_freq,
    main = "Pie Chart of Cylinder Counts",
    col = c("lightblue", "lightgreen", "lightpink"),
    border = "white")
## boxplot
data(mtcars)
par(bg = "gray")
boxplot(mpg ~ cyl,
        data = mtcars,
        main = "Boxplot of MPG by Cylinder Count",
        xlab = "Number of Cylinders",
        ylab = "Miles Per Gallon (mpg)",
        col = "darkgray",
        border = "deeppink3")

## scatterplot
data(mtcars)
par(bg = "gray95")
plot(mtcars$hp, mtcars$mpg,
     main = "Scatter Plot of MPG vs Horsepower",
     xlab = "Horsepower (hp)",
     ylab = "Miles Per Gallon (mpg)",
     col = "deeppink3",
     pch = 20)
## ggplot2 graphs
library(ggplot2) 
data(mtcars)
##histogram
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = mpg)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 2, fill = "darkgray", color = "deeppink3") +
  labs(title = "Histogram of Miles Per Gallon",
       x = "Miles Per Gallon (mpg)",
       y = "Frequency") +
  theme_minimal(base_family = "sans") +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "gray"))
## barcharts
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_bar(fill = "darkgray", color = "deeppink3") +
  labs(title = "Vertical Bar Chart of Cylinder Counts",
       x = "Number of Cylinders",
       y = "Frequency") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "gray"))
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_bar(fill = "darkgray", color = "deeppink3") +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(title = "Horizontal Bar Chart of Cylinder Counts",
       x = "Number of Cylinders",
       y = "Frequency") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "gray"))
## piechart 
cyl_freq <- as.data.frame(table(mtcars$cyl))
colnames(cyl_freq) <- c("cyl", "freq")

ggplot(cyl_freq, aes(x = "", y = freq, fill = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", width = 1, color = "white") +
  coord_polar("y") +
  labs(title = "Pie Chart of Cylinder Counts", fill = "Cylinders") +
  theme_void() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "gray"))
#. boxplot
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = factor(cyl), y = mpg)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill = "darkgray", color = "deeppink3") +
  labs(title = "Boxplot of MPG by Cylinder Count",
       x = "Number of Cylinders",
       y = "Miles Per Gallon (mpg)") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "gray"))
## scatterplot
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = hp, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point(color = "deeppink3", size = 2) +
  labs(title = "Scatter Plot of MPG vs Horsepower",
       x = "Horsepower (hp)",
       y = "Miles Per Gallon (mpg)") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "gray"))
```
